entry.title: Argentina in World Cup Final Gives Tired Nation a Reason to Celebrate
entry.content: Hit hard by economic stagnation and inflation, Argentines put hardship aside to watch Lionel Messi and their team take on France and celebrate.

entry.title: Ukraine Races to Restore Power in Cities After Russian Missile Barrage
entry.content: Russian assaults are eroding Ukrainians’ access to heat, light and water as temperatures drop.

entry.title: Beijing Crematorium's Death Surge Points to Rising Covid Toll
entry.content: One of the Chinese capital’s designated crematoria for Covid-19 patients has been flooded with dead bodies in the wake of the country’s loosening of pandemic restrictions.

entry.title: The Chechen Warlord Who Does Putin's Dirty Work in Ukraine
entry.content: Ramzan Kadyrov, once an anti-Russian rebel, now gets billions from Moscow and plays a key role in the battle for Ukraine.
